channel.title: [fatal error]? help please i need to fix it quick!
channel.description: i keep getting this error [code]PimpScape Server [fatal] - exception Exception in thread "main" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 1000001 at stream.createFrame(stream.java:153) at client.l33thax(client.java:16340) at client.process(client.java:17264) at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:137) at server.main(server.java:47)[/code] how do i fix it?

item.title: [fatal error]? help please i need to fix it quick!

it was in it when i downloaded

No, this is a error in his player handler. Re-download the pimpscape source and copy and paste the playerhandler to the other.
[/quote][quote author=iceman327 link=topic=231281.msg1980325#msg1980325 date=1199596587]
You gotta change bloods into ecto tokens
[/quote]

Where the hell is this coming from?[/quote]

Well he said that when players took bloods outa bank it froze em er something?
and that they couldn’t log back in.

Bows down to all powerful coder
